parameters.jsonQuery:
={
  "start_date": "{{ $('Determine Report Configuration').item.json.period.start_date }}",
  "end_date": "{{ $('Determine Report Configuration').item.json.period.end_date }}",
  "include_billable_hours": true,
  "include_project_breakdown": true,
  "calculate_efficiency": true
}

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "report_type": "{{ $('Determine Report Configuration').item.json.report_type }}",
  "period": {{ JSON.stringify($('Determine Report Configuration').item.json.period) }},
  "data": {{ JSON.stringify($('Compile Report Data').item.json) }},
  "pdf_url": "{{ $('Generate PDF Report').item.json.file_url }}",
  "generated_by": "automation",
  "recipients": {{ JSON.stringify($('Determine Report Configuration').item.json.recipients) }},
  "metadata": {
    "alerts_count": {{ $('Compile Report Data').item.json.alerts.length }},
    "critical_alerts": {{ $('Compile Report Data').item.json.alerts.filter(alert => alert.type === 'critical').length }},
    "recommendations_count": {{ $('Compile Report Data').item.json.recommendations.length }},
    "data_sources": {{ JSON.stringify($('Compile Report Data').item.json.report_metadata.data_sources) }},
    "automation_version": "2.0"
  }
}

={
  "project_ids": {{ JSON.stringify($('Compile Report Data').item.json.project_profitability.underperforming_projects.map(p => p.id)) }},
  "flag_reason": "low_profitability",
  "priority": "medium",
  "review_type": "profitability_analysis",
  "automated_flag": true,
  "assigned_to": "project-management-team",
  "notes": "Projects flagged by automated financial reporting due to profit margins below 20%. Requires immediate review of scope, pricing, and resource allocation.",
  "action_items": [
    "Review project scope and deliverables",
    "Analyze resource allocation efficiency",
    "Evaluate pricing strategy",
    "Consider scope adjustments or rate increases",
    "Document lessons learned for future projects"
  ]
}
